Released: 24 September 2025

## Highlights

- *New PGD Version Support:* PGD version 5.9 is now supported
- *New PG4K operator Version Support:* PG4K operator v1.26.1 is now supported

## Supported versions

- Kubernetes: 1.33, 1.32, 1.31, and 1.30
- PostgreSQL: 17, 16, 15, 14, and 13

  PostgreSQL 17.6 is the default image
  
  PostgreSQL 13 support ends on November 12, 2025
- PG4K: v1.25.0, v1.25.1, v1.25.2, v1.26.0, 1.26.1

## Default images

- PGD: `docker.enterprisedb.com/k8s_enterprise_pgd/postgresql-pgd:17.6-pgd590-ubi9`
- PGD proxy: `docker.enterprisedb.com/k8s_enterprise_pgd/edb-pgd-proxy:5.9.0-ubi9`

This release of EDB Postgres® AI for CloudNativePG™ Global Cluster includes the following:

## Features

<table class="table w-100"><thead><tr><th>Description</th><th width="10%">Addresses</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td><details><summary>Barman Cloud Plugin updated to v0.6.0</summary><hr/><p>Supports customization of the plugin image from the operator configmap.</p>
</details></td><td>#1068, #1421</td></tr>
<tr><td>PGD Group Configuration supports configuring instance pod env through pgdgroup YAML</td><td>#1509</td></tr>
</tbody></table>


## Security Fixes

<table class="table w-100"><thead><tr><th>Description</th><th width="10%">Addresses</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td>Update the operator base image to latest version of ubi-micro v9.6.</td><td>#1514</td></tr>
</tbody></table>


## Bug Fixes

<table class="table w-100"><thead><tr><th>Description</th><th width="10%">Addresses</th></tr></thead><tbody>
<tr><td><details><summary>PGD 5.9 compatibility for enable_raft for subgroup</summary><hr/><p>previously, enable_raft for subgroup could not be enabled with PGD 5.9</p>
</details></td><td>#1516</td></tr>
<tr><td>VolumeSnapshot restore sometimes hangs during cleanup metadata phase</td><td>#1547</td></tr>
<tr><td><details><summary>Physical join logging</summary><hr/><p>Pipe the physical join (bdr_init_physical command) log with the PostgreSQL log into the physical join job</p>
</details></td><td>#1515</td></tr>
<tr><td><details><summary>TLS and certificates - mount the correct serverTLSSecret in the physical join job</summary><hr/><p>Fix physical join job failure when a self-signed certificate is used and only the private key is shared across regions</p>
</details></td><td>#1505</td></tr>
<tr><td>Operator configmap name to use pgd-operator-controller-manager-config in all cases</td><td>#1493</td></tr>
<tr><td>Show major version upgrade in PGDGroup phase</td><td>#1333</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
